game.title: The Mysterious Game
game.synopsis: The main protagonist wakes up to find a letter from their deceased mother, revealing details about a mysterious game she was playing before her death. The clues within the letter guide them on a journey to solve the mystery, encountering strange creatures and unexpected challenges along the way. With every revelation, they uncover more about their mother's secret life and its hidden legacy.
game.beginning: Waking up to the mysterious letter
game.ending: Unraveling the mystery and embracing the legacy
